# latex_table.format_number { #xraypy.latex_table.format_number }

`latex_table.format_number(x, n_signif_digits=0)`

Format number

## Parameters

| Name              | Type              | Description                                    | Default    |
|-------------------|-------------------|------------------------------------------------|------------|
| `x`               | numpy.numpy.array | float/double number array                      | _required_ |
| `n_signif_digits` | int               | number of the significant digits, by default 0 | `0`        |

## Returns

| Type              | Description     |
|-------------------|-----------------|
| numpy.numpy.array | formatted array |
